thread.title: Arsenal to join the race for £40million-valued Celtic starlet Moussa Dembele this summer
thread.title_full: Arsenal to join the race for £40million-valued Celtic starlet Moussa Dembele this summer

author: Steve Stammers
title: Arsenal to join the race for £40million-valued Celtic starlet Moussa Dembele this summer
text:
Dembele has several big clubs monitoring him (Photo: Ian MacNicol) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Arsenal will join the race for Celtic forward Moussa Dembele this summer. 
The 20-year-old is valued at £40million-plus by the Glasgow club after they signed him from Fulham for just £500,000 last June. 
Chelsea and Manchester City have also been alerted by the France Under-21 star’s stunning form this season, including a hat-trick in Celtic’s 6-0 Scottish Cup win over Inverness yesterday. 
Celtic boss Brendan Rodgers resisted all approaches for Dembele during the January transfer window, although – but Arsenal will now make their move in the summer. 
Chelsea and City have both registered their interest in Dembele, with the Gunnners completing a high-profile trio. poll loading Will Moussa Dembele still be at Celtic next term? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
